doc:
Andreas Katsulas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andreas_Katsulas 0 Andrew "Andreas" Katsulas (May 18, 1946 – February 13, 2006) was an American actor known for his roles as Ambassador G'Kar in the science-fiction television series Babylon 5, as the one-armed villain Sykes in the film The Fugitive (1993), and as the Romulan Commander Tomalak on Star Trek: The Next Generation. He also played Vissian Captain Drennik in the Star Trek: Enterprise episode "Cogenitor". Andrew_"_Andreas_"_Katsulas ( May_18_,_1946 – February_13_,_2006 ) was an_American_actor known for his_roles as Ambassador_G'Kar in the_science-fiction_television_series_Babylon_5 , as the_one-armed_villain_Sykes in the_film The_Fugitive ( 1993 ) , and as the_Romulan_Commander_Tomalak on Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation . He also played Vissian_Captain_Drennik in the_Star_Trek : Enterprise_episode_"_Cogenitor_" .
